name: The Godfather: Great Movie Personages
description:
An excellent way of recognizing the personages from the The Godfather movies. Guess which personage is it. Simply enter the name in the squares. Several help options are available. You’ll get coins for correct answers which will be added in your total score. You can obtain additional coins from the menu.
During the game there is a bonus system, which gives you bonus scores.
Guess 15 personages correctly to unlock the next levels.
If you need to ask for help, send the images to facebook or twitter.
